div.p: A code assigned to any component that has medicinal properties, and supplies pharmacological activity or other direct effect in the diagnosis, cure, mitigation, treatment or prevention of disease, or to affect the structure or any function of the body of man or other animals. http://www.hc-sc.gc.ca/dhp-mps/prodpharma/databasdon/index_e.html

description.value: Description: A code assigned to any component that has medicinal properties, and supplies pharmacological activity or other direct effect in the diagnosis, cure, mitigation, treatment or prevention of disease, or to affect the structure or any function of the body of man or other animals. http://www.hc-sc.gc.ca/dhp-mps/prodpharma/databasdon/index_e.html
